 
Given the values of A,D,N and X.
Find the value of the following expression:

Since the answer can be very large,output the final answer % 274877906944.

Input
First line will contain T,the no of test cases.
The next T lines will contain the values of A,D,N,X.Note: For this problem submissions are allowed only in C/C++

Output
For each test case output the required answer in a single line.

Constraints
1<=T<=100
0<=A,D,X<=10^5
0<=N<=10^6

Example
Input: 

2
1 1 1 1
2 2 2 2

Output:
3
22
